sentence: TEL  AVIV,  Israel  â€”  The  secretary-general  of  the  United  Nations  has  called  on  countries  to  continue  funding  the  main  agency  that  provides  aid  to  Palestinians  in  Gaza,  following  allegations  that  some  of  its  employees  were  involved  in  the  Oct.  7  attack  by  Hamas  that  killed  some  1,200  people  in  Israel.
The  agency  said  that  the  building  housed  some  800  displaced  people  and  that  at  least  13  people  were  killed  and  56  injured  in  the  incident.
Heavy  fighting  in  Khan  Younis  has  killed  and  wounded  dozens  of  people  in  recent  days,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry.
It  estimates  that  over  26,000  people  have  died  in  Gaza  since  the  war  began.
The  ministry  says  the  majority  of  those  who  have  been  killed  are  women  and  children.
